__e: This thing must have a virus.
You can't get infected by a computer.
Likewise in my life, uh, I can be infected by things around me. It could be a tv program, I could overhear a conversation and think, "oh, that's interesting.".
I know, when the virus first affected me, I thought about it too, putting an end to the suffering, but I couldn't.
And how can you trust a man of God living in a house already been infected by the Devil?
Even if there was another boy that got away, he could still be infected by whatever killed the other two.
You get infected and you didn't even tell me.
He's infected and on the move.
You're... I must find out where it came from-- this thing which infected me and gave me true self-awareness.
